charges.charge_disposition: AMENDED JUDGMENT: Imprisonment for a term of 61 months. This Sentence consist of 37 months as to counts One and Ten, to run concurrent and 24 months as to count Eight, to be served consecutively to counts One and Ten; Followed by a term of 3 years Supervised Release. This term consist of 3 years as to Count One, 1 year as to Count Eight, and 3 years as to Count Ten, All such terms to run concurrently. Restitution: $56,168.33
